CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Grant_Reviewer_Name__c) = 'Vikas Jain','jain@toronto.ca', IF(TEXT(Grant_Reviewer_Name__c) ='Sandi Koitsis-Zigomanis','skoitsi@toronto.ca', IF(TEXT(Grant_Reviewer_Name__c) ='Marcie Wenn','mwenn@retailcouncil.org', IF(TEXT(Grant_Reviewer_Name__c) ='Andrew Patricio','andrew@bizlaunch.com', ''))))
